title: Green Lion
typeOfFood: Vegan, Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Fast food, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. All menu items are labeled, including gluten free, lactose free, low carb, and vegan. Vegan items include a chia oat bowl, salad bowl, quinoa salad and a tofu dish made with zucchini and carrot noodles. Uses honey, agave syrup, sucralose or erythritol in the baked goods; no refined or white sugar.
